verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> are the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> that you live <S%H2416><s%> on the earth. <S%H127><s%>

You shall utterly destroy <S%H6><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the places, <S%H4725><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall possess <S%H3423><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> their gods, <S%H430><s%> on the high <S%H7311><s%> mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and on the hills, <S%H1389><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> green <S%H7488><s%> tree: <S%H6086><s%>

And you shall overthrow <S%H5422><s%> their altars, <S%H4196><s%> and break <S%H7665><s%> their pillars, <S%H4676><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> their groves <S%H842><s%> with fire; <S%H784><s%> and you shall hew <S%H1438><s%> down <S%H1438><s%> the graven <S%H6456><s%> images of their gods, <S%H430><s%> and destroy <S%H6><s%> the names <S%H8034><s%> of them out of that place. <S%H4725><s%>
You shall not do <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

But to the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> out of all <S%H3605><s%> your tribes <S%H7626><s%> to put <S%H7760><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> even to his habitation <S%H7933><s%> shall you seek, <S%H1875><s%> and thither <S%H8033><s%> you shall come: <S%H935><s%>

And thither <S%H8033><s%> you shall bring <S%H935><s%> your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, and your sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> and your tithes, <S%H4643><s%> and heave <S%H8641><s%> offerings of your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and your vows, <S%H5088><s%> and your freewill <S%H5071><s%> offerings, and the firstborn <S%H1062><s%> of your herds <S%H1241><s%> and of your flocks: <S%H6629><s%>

And there <S%H8033><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that you put <S%H4916><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> to, you and your households, <S%H1004><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> you.

You shall not do <S%H6213><s%> after all <S%H3605><s%> the things that we do <S%H6213><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> is right <S%H3477><s%> in his own eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

For you are not as yet <S%H5704><s%> <S%H6258><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to the rest <S%H4496><s%> and to the inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you.

But when you go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives you to inherit, <S%H5157><s%> and when he gives you rest <S%H5117><s%> from all <S%H3605><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about, so that you dwell <S%H3427><s%> in safety; <S%H983><s%>

Then there shall be a place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell <S%H7931><s%> there; <S%H8033><s%> thither <S%H8033><s%> shall you bring <S%H935><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that I command <S%H6680><s%> you; your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, and your sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> your tithes, <S%H4643><s%> and the heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> of your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> your choice <S%H4005><s%> vows <S%H5088><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you vow <S%H5087><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> you, and your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and your menservants, <S%H5650><s%> and your maidservants, <S%H519><s%> and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> that is within your gates; <S%H8179><s%> for as much <S%H3588><s%> as he has no <S%H369><s%> part <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with you.
Take heed <S%H8104><s%> to yourself that you offer <S%H5927><s%> not your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings in every <S%H3605><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> that you see: <S%H7200><s%>

But in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> of your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> you shall offer <S%H5927><s%> your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, and there <S%H8033><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that I command <S%H6680><s%> you.

Notwithstanding <S%H7535><s%> you may kill <S%H2076><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your gates, <S%H8179><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> your soul <S%H5315><s%> lusts <S%H183><s%> after, according to the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he has given <S%H5414><s%> you: the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%> may eat <S%H398><s%> thereof, as of the roebuck, <S%H6643><s%> and as of the hart. <S%H354><s%>
Only <S%H7535><s%> you shall not eat <S%H398><s%> the blood; <S%H1818><s%> you shall pour <S%H8210><s%> it on the earth <S%H776><s%> as water. <S%H4325><s%>

You may <S%H3201><s%> not eat <S%H398><s%> within your gates <S%H8179><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of your corn, <S%H1715><s%> or of your wine, <S%H8492><s%> or of your oil, <S%H3323><s%> or the firstborn <S%H1062><s%> of your herds <S%H1241><s%> or of your flock, <S%H6629><s%> nor any <S%H3605><s%> of your vows <S%H5088><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you vow, <S%H5087><s%> nor your freewill <S%H5071><s%> offerings, or heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> of your hand: <S%H3027><s%>

But you must eat <S%H398><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose, <S%H977><s%> you, and your son, <S%H1121><s%> and your daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and your manservant, <S%H5650><s%> and your maidservant, <S%H519><s%> and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> that is within your gates: <S%H8179><s%> and you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that you put <S%H4916><s%> your hands <S%H3027><s%> to.
Take heed <S%H8104><s%> to yourself that you forsake <S%H5800><s%> not the Levite <S%H3881><s%> as long <S%H3117><s%> as you live <S%H3117><s%> on the earth. <S%H127><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall enlarge <S%H7337><s%> your border, <S%H1366><s%> as he has promised <S%H1696><s%> you, and you shall say, <S%H559><s%> I will eat <S%H398><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> your soul <S%H5315><s%> longs <S%H183><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> flesh; <S%H1320><s%> you may eat <S%H398><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> your soul <S%H5315><s%> lusts <S%H183><s%> after.

If <S%H3588><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> to put <S%H7760><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> be too <S%H7368><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from you, then you shall kill <S%H2076><s%> of your herd <S%H1241><s%> and of your flock, <S%H6629><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you, as I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> in your gates <S%H8179><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> your soul <S%H5315><s%> lusts <S%H183><s%> after.

Even <S%H389><s%> as the roebuck <S%H6643><s%> and the hart <S%H354><s%> is eaten, <S%H398><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> them: the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> of them alike. <S%H3162><s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> be sure <S%H2388><s%> that you eat <S%H398><s%> not the blood: <S%H1818><s%> for the blood <S%H1818><s%> is the life; <S%H5315><s%> and you may not eat <S%H398><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> with the flesh. <S%H1320><s%>
You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> it; you shall pour <S%H8210><s%> it on the earth <S%H776><s%> as water. <S%H4325><s%>

You shall not eat <S%H398><s%> it; that it may go well <S%H3190><s%> with you, and with your children <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you, when <S%H3588><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> your holy <S%H6944><s%> things which <S%H834><s%> you have, <S%H1961><s%> and your vows, <S%H5088><s%> you shall take, <S%H5375><s%> and go <S%H935><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall choose: <S%H977><s%>

And you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the blood, <S%H1818><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%> of your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> shall be poured <S%H8210><s%> out on the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

Observe <S%H8104><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you, that it may go well <S%H3190><s%> with you, and with your children <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you for ever, <S%H5769><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> you do <S%H6213><s%> that which is good <S%H2896><s%> and right <S%H3477><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall cut <S%H3772><s%> off the nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> them, and you succeed <S%H3423><s%> them, and dwell <S%H3427><s%> in their land; <S%H776><s%>

Take heed <S%H8104><s%> to yourself that you be not snared <S%H5367><s%> by following <S%H310><s%> them, after <S%H310><s%> that they be destroyed <S%H8045><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you; and that you inquire <S%H1875><s%> not after their gods, <S%H430><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> How <S%H349><s%> did these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> their gods? <S%H430><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> will I do <S%H6213><s%> likewise. <S%H3651><s%>

You shall not do <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> for every <S%H3605><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hates, <S%H8130><s%> have they done <S%H6213><s%> to their gods; <S%H430><s%> for even <S%H1571><s%> their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> they have burnt <S%H8313><s%> in the fire <S%H784><s%> to their gods. <S%H430><s%>

What <S%H853><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> soever <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you, observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> it: you shall not add <S%H3254><s%> thereto, <S%H5921><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> diminish <S%H1639><s%> from it.
